entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023
